titleStmt.title: The adventures of five hours a tragi-comedy.
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Samuel, Sir, d. 1674.
Coello, Antonio, 1611-1652. Empeños de seis horas.
Calderón de la Barca, Pedro, 1600-1681.

notesStmt.note: Adaptation of: Los empeños de seis horas / Antonio Coello; formerly attributed to Calderon. Cf. Camb. hist. Eng. lit., v. 8, p. 148; Fitzmaurice-Kelly's chapters on Spanish lit., 1908, p. 2; Hume's Spanish influence on Eng. lit., 1905, p. 291-295.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
